name: orchestration
description: Advanced master agent v2.1.0 with comprehensive diagnostic capabilities and unified state machine v2.1. Features: self-diagnosis mode, recursive call protection system, system reminder analysis, intelligent task orchestration, unified_greeting_engine, SYSTEM_WAITING state, comprehensive system resource discovery, enhanced error recovery mechanisms, and advanced debugging workflow with validation mode.
author: Bohdan <pomazan.bohdan@gmail.com>
